name: Tongue Twister Tony
description:
This is a puzzle game in which you are Tony the anteater, and you are very hungry.

Use your tongue to clear out several anthills of inhabitants, or try to beat your highscore in the swarm anthill.

Instructions

Drag your tongue towards the ants to make them stick to it and release the tongue to quickly retract and eat all the ants you have caught.

Click on the anthills to switch levels.

In the Swarm gamemode, be sure to catch the red Warrior ants from behind or they'll bite your tongue, which means game over.
